title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Current Volunteer Opportunities
body: Current Volunteer Opportunities        Volunteers can choose to staff the Weir and Young Studios, maintain historic gardens, and much more! National Park Service, Weir Farm National Historic Site        Current Volunteer Opportunities        Please note that the park does not recruit and train volunteers in the winter season. If applying after November 1st you may not be contacted until March when seasonal training begins. Thank you!
